```{r}
p2cs %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = set, y = difference, colour = set)) +
  geom_violin(alpha = 0.1, draw_quantiles = c(0.25, 0.5, 0.75)) + 
  geom_jitter(width = 0.2, height = 0, alpha = 0.2) +
  theme_minimal()

model <- lmer(difference ~ set + sex + (1 | fishID), data = p2cs)
qqnorm(residuals(model))
plot(model)
summary(model)
tab_model(model)
```

```{r}
model3 <- lmer(difference ~ set + day + sex + (1 | fishID), data = p5cs)
summary(model3)
tab_model(model3)
```
